lines: TELL ME THE STORY OF JESUS
Ndaambile majwi a Jesu, lemba mu moyo wangu,
Ndaambile majwi mabotu, majwi a lufutuko,
Bulemu ku Mwami Leza, luumuno munyika
Ndaambile majwi a Jesu, lemba mu moyo wangu
Ndaambile majwi mabotu, majwi a lufutuko.
Ndaambile milimo yakwe ndaambile kuusa kwakwe,
Langa luse lwa Muvuni, wakafwida ndimubi
